thread.title: J.J. Genevive Releases Second Single from His Debut Album
thread.title_full: J.J. Genevive Releases Second Single from His Debut Album - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: J.J. Genevive Releases Second Single from His Debut Album
text:
J.J. Genevive Releases Second Single from His Debut Album
New York, NY, September 10, 2015 --( PR.com )-- J.J. Genevive is proud to announce the release of his new single 'Twilight Starlight' from his debut EP 'Fantastic Poptastic' (Big Noise).
Says J.J., "Lyrically, 'Twilight Starlight' is a love song. It is about the moment when you met the person who changed your life forever. So everytime I see the sun setting in that transitional period from day to night, I think of the person who changed my life."
"Musically, 'Twilight Starlight' began as a three chord guitar riff and the desire to redefine a love song. So, instead of tender and sweet, my version of a love song is fierce and aggressive." That is the uniqueness of J.J. Genevive.
J.J. was placed on the 57th Annual Grammy Awards Ballot for Best Pop Performance by The Recording Academy.
'Twilight Starlight' video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LGmuEiGvzGg
iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/fantastic-poptastic-ep/id8911054
Official Website: http://www.bignoisenow.com/jjgenevive.html
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/J.J.Genevive
